fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may blight a player at night, or poison a blighted player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Blights block your target from using their role's night ability. (Standard Roleblock message)
- Poisoning a blighted player will deal a Basic Attack to them. They will die the following night if they had no defense.
- With the Necronomicon, you will deal a Blight and a Basic Attack to your target.
